entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ubuntu_22_04 Build_Release CI build fails to copy asset file intermittently #27658

Closed

  • TargetPlatformAttribute & SupportedOSPlatformAttribute while Multi-Targeting #15596
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix br compression size regression in Blazor WASM #27659
    arch-wasm, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove timeout, reenable ProjectReferences_Graph test #27657
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27649
    Area-Compatibility
  • do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type #27648
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Simplify error message #27646
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Target resolver to .NET 6 #27660
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1982575 #27606
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #27623
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1982825 #27636
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC2 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update public pool names #27617
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 7.0.1xx rc1 to rc2 #27568

Updated

  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update our helix pre-download code to try to pre-download for non-windows legs as well. #27306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Quote file paths for the BrotliCompress tool #27213
    Servicing-approved, Area-WebSDK, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.305
  • Remove assumption that dotnet-watch impl is only executed from dotnet process to allow testing #27637
    Area-Watch
  • Apply the same editorconfig rules to TemplateEngine parts as dotnet/templating repo #27611
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • test install-scripts #23812
    Area-Infrastructure
